string-array.name: level_stories
string-array.item:
school_friend@R:So, finally you'll get graduated tomorrow!
 school_friend@R:Are you stressed by the final examination?
 hero@L:Well, not really.
 hero@L:I don't expect the examination to be that hard. This invoker school is not famous for its difficulty.
 school_friend@R:Sure, that's why I selected that one!
 school_friend@R:But still, what about a small training fight?
 hero@L:I don't really need to, you know?
 school_friend@R:Oh, come on! I'll start gently with a small card.
 school_friend@R:And I'm really curious to see what kind of creatures you can invoke now.
 hero@L:If you insist…

school_friend@R:Well, I knew you would have defeated that one easily.
 hero@L:Is that all you can do?
 school_friend@R:Don't worry, the next one will be stronger!
 school_friend@R:If I were you I would get some new cards at the school library.
 school_friend@R:I heard that the owner was once a great invoker but now he is starting to get too old for that and trade his invoker cards in exchange of some well-executed tasks.
 school_friend@R:That's a easy way to become a better invoker, but be careful: you can't take too many card in your deck unless you become more experienced and gain more free slots.
school_friend@R:So, ready to fight?\n hero@L:I don\'t need to be ready to defeat you.

school_friend@R:Again, it seems to be so easy for you that it\'s almost frustrating…\n school_friend@R:But it\'s not finished yet, I still have something to try.\n school_friend@R:I have some support card to use after my creatures to reinforce them, so you would better prepare yourself.
school_friend@R:Now I\'ll go full power! Prepare yourself!\n hero@L:How long will that last? I\'m not in the mood of playing.

school_friend@R:Well, I admit there is no use to continue, I guess you're ready for the examination.
 school_friend@R:More you level up and more you'll be able to easily invoke several powerful creatures, I have to admit I'm curious to see how far you'll end up in the army.
 school_friend@R:By the way, do you already knows what you'll do after your diploma?
 hero@L:Do I really have the choice?
 school_friend@R:It's true that the Erya Kingdom is recruiting almost everyone for his army, but there is several possibilities for an invoker inside the army.
 school_friend@R:Some decide to help with construction and some prefer to fight.
 hero@L:In all cases women are not allowed to fight, they can only support the army. So the choice is quite limited.

school_master@R:Here is the final examination day!
 school_master@R:How do you feel?
 hero@L:Ready to pass it.
 school_master@R:Great. You just have to win that battle and you'll be an official Erya Kingdom invoker!

school_master@R:Here you are! That wasn\'t hard for you, right?\n school_master@R:I\'m happy to say you\'re now an official invoker. You\'ll soon receive your diploma and an Erya Kingdom officer will interview you afterward.

officer@R:So before we start let me present myself: I was also an invoker student and I\'m now lieutenant in the Erya army.\n officer@R:I\'m notably in charge of recruiting invokers inside the kingdom of assign them to a specific regiment.\n officer@R:First of all, show me what you are capable of.

officer@R:Hum… I have to say I'm impressed. You'll be a very good support soldier.
 hero@L:Maybe, but it will not happen. I want to enter the 5th Infantry Regiment.
 officer@R:The 5th Infantry Regiment? That is clearly not possible. Infantry regiments does not accept women and the 5th one is directly exposed to the enemy.
 officer@R:We only assign trained male invokers and swordsman there.
 hero@L:I'm trained enough for that, I would be more useful in that regiment than simply helping construct buildings or ships.
 hero@L:I can do more than what you have seen for now and I'll prove it to you right now!
